message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice!  While I appreciate the product, $15,000 is a bit more than I can comfortably spend right now. Would you be willing to come down to $11,000?  I'm really interested in this product and I think we can find a price that works for both of us.

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is a good compromise for me, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $13,250. I think that's a fair price considering the value this product brings, and I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement.
